title: Echinicola vietnamensis
text: Echinicola vietnamensis is a <a href="heterotrophic">heterotrophic</a> and <a href="halotolerant">halotolerant</a> bacterium from the genus of <a href="Echinicola">Echinicola</a> which has been isolated from seawater from a <a href="musselfarm">musselfarm</a> from the <a href="Nha%20Trang%20Bay">Nha Trang Bay</a> in <a href="Vietnam">Vietnam</a>.
